note.p: Brewer. Elder in Galashiels. Probably John Haldane, brewer, of Buckholmside, Melrose (1796–1854).
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Melrose 12/8), 1851 (Melrose 11/24)
Scotland old parish registers births 799/40 31 Melrose (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 18 July 2022)
Scotland wills and testaments, Jedburgh SC62/44/24 (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 18 July 2022)
